name: graphql
description: A Query Language and Runtime which can target any service.

0.0.2.name: graphql
0.0.2.description: A Query Language and Runtime which can target any service.

scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specified" && exit 1
scripts.prebuild: npm run lint && npm run clean
scripts.build: 6to5 lib --experimental --modules common --optional selfContained --out-dir build

0.1.0.name: graphql
0.1.0.description: A Query Language and Runtime which can target any service.

scripts.test: mocha $npm_package_options_mocha && npm run check
scripts.cover: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --report html node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.build: rm -rf lib/* & babel src --ignore __tests__ --optional runtime --out-dir lib

0.1.2.name: graphql
0.1.2.description: A Query Language and Runtime which can target any service.

scripts.test: mocha $npm_package_options_mocha && npm run check
scripts.cover: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --report html node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- $npm_package_options_mocha

0.1.3.name: graphql
0.1.3.description: A Query Language and Runtime which can target any service.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check && mocha $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.cover: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --report html node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.build: rm -rf lib/* && babel src --ignore __tests__ --optional runtime --out-dir lib
scripts.coveralls: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --report html node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- $npm_package_options_mocha && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js

scripts.prepublish: not-in-install && (if [ "$CI" = true ]; then babel src --ignore __tests__ --out-dir ./; else echo 'Only CI can publish. Read CONTRIBUTING.md' 1>&2; exit 1; fi) || exit 0

0.1.12.name: graphql

0.5.0-beta.1.name: graphql
0.5.0-beta.1.description: A Query Language and Runtime which can target any service.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check && npm run testonly
scripts.check-cover: for file in {src/*.js,src/**/*.js}; do echo $file; flow coverage $file; done
scripts.build: babel src --ignore __tests__ --out-dir dist/ && cp package.json dist/
scripts.cover: babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --root src --report html _mocha -- $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.cover:lcov: babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --root src --report lcovonly _mocha -- $npm_package_options_mocha
